headline: Strength in Software & Services Unit Drives Axon: Can the Momentum Sustain?
summary: AXON lifts 2025 revenue outlook as Software & Services surges with rising subscriptions and strong demand for digital tools.

headline: Multiple Growth Drivers Lifted Axon (AXON) in Q2
summary: Fidelity Investments, an investment management company, recently released its “Fidelity Growth Strategies Fund” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The Fidelity Growth Strategies Fund is a diversified domestic equity strategy with a focus on mid-cap growth investments.
